typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> WeatherManRestAPI
WeatherManRestAPI sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> BlobSink
